alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 12:54PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT... For the Freeze Warning tonight, duration of freezing temperatures between 2 and 6 hours expected. For the Freeze Watch Sunday night, near freezing temperatures of 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Orange, Seminole, Coastal Volusia and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
